# STATS::STAT_GET_CURRENT_DRIVING_REVERSE_DISTANCE

## Summary
Get the current distance driven in reverse

## Returns
* **FLOAT**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Reverse the longest distance without crashing
